Staff Help Center

Quick reference guide for daily operations and troubleshooting

Quick Rules

Always Scan QR First

Verify customer identity before applying any rewards or adding points

Points Must Match Receipt

Enter the exact purchase amount. 1 point = 100 THB spent

Voucher QR Expires in 10 Minutes

Check the countdown timer. Expired QR codes cannot be used

Check Valid Locations

Some vouchers are only valid at specific outlets (Sukhumvit, Old Town, Roastery)

How to Add Points

  1. 1

    Scan customer's loyalty QR code

  2. 2

    Enter exact purchase amount from receipt

  3. 3

    Verify points calculation (1 point per 100 THB)

  4. 4

    Confirm transaction

  5. 5

    Points appear in customer account immediately

How to Redeem Voucher

  1. 1

    Customer shows voucher QR code on their phone

  2. 2

    Scan the voucher QR code

  3. 3

    Verify customer details and voucher information

  4. 4

    Check expiry countdown (must be above 0:00)

  5. 5

    Confirm voucher is valid at current branch

  6. 6

    Redeem voucher and provide item/discount

Common Errors & Solutions

QR Code Expired

Ask customer to regenerate voucher QR from their app

Wrong Branch

Check voucher location restrictions. Direct customer to correct outlet

Already Redeemed

Voucher can only be used once. Cannot be redeemed again

Insufficient Points

Customer needs more points to redeem this reward

Camera Troubleshooting

Camera Permission Denied

Go to browser settings → Site settings → Allow camera access for this site

QR Code Not Scanning

Ask customer to increase screen brightness, hold phone steady 15-20cm from camera

Camera Already in Use

Close other apps using camera, refresh the page, try again

Camera Not Working

Use Manual Entry button to paste QR token directly

Offline Troubleshooting

No Internet Connection

Check WiFi/mobile data. Transactions require active internet connection

Transaction Failed

Do NOT retry immediately. Check "Today's Transactions" to see if it was recorded

Points Not Updating

Ask customer to pull down to refresh their app. Contact support if issue persists

Points Calculation Reference

1 Point = 100 THB

Points are automatically calculated when you enter the purchase amount

Purchase: 350 THB

Earns: 3 points

Purchase: 1,250 THB

Earns: 12 points

Purchase: 99 THB

Earns: 0 points

Purchase: 5,000 THB

Earns: 50 points

Branch Restrictions

Your Branch is Locked

You are currently assigned to Sukhumvit branch. All transactions are recorded for this location

Branch-Specific Vouchers

Some vouchers can only be redeemed at specific outlets. Check the voucher details before confirming

Cross-Branch Loyalty Cards

Loyalty QR codes work at ALL branches. Points are shared across all Sarnies locations

Privacy Rules

Never Share Customer Data

Customer phone numbers, points balance, and transaction history are confidential

Never Screenshot Customer QR Codes

QR codes are personal identifiers. Do not save, share, or reuse them

Verify Identity

Always verify the customer is the account owner before processing transactions

Security Rules

Never Process Your Own Account

Staff cannot earn points or redeem vouchers on their own accounts during shifts

Report Suspicious Activity

Multiple scans, fake receipts, or unusual requests should be reported immediately

One Scan Per Purchase

Each receipt can only be scanned once. Check "Today's Transactions" to prevent duplicates

Logout After Shift

Always logout from the staff portal when your shift ends

Simulation Mode

Practice Without Risk

Use Simulation Mode to practice scanning and transactions without affecting real customer data

Access via Sidebar

Navigate to Staff Tools → Simulator in the sidebar menu

Test All Scenarios

Try earning points, redeeming vouchers, and handling errors in a safe environment

Need Help?

If you encounter issues not covered here, contact your manager or the support team

Support: manager@sarnies.com
